name: Bug Bite
effect: The Target can't consume berries for 2 Rounds. The User may spend their Bonus Action to gain the effects of a berry from the target's Inventory. The User can't select an individual berry more than once. Berries used in this way can't be consumed until the end of combat.
description: The Pokemon nibbles its foe, if it finds something tasty it will eat it in an instant. It may try to eat almost anything.
